full_summary:
### Sample Collection and Microbiological Analytical Testing Services RFP
#### Title and Reference Information
* **Contract Title**: Sample Collection and Microbiological Analytical Testing Services RFP
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4199734926-Doc4199796559
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4199734926

#### Tender Information
* **Publication Date**: September 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: November 9, 2023

#### Tender Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026
* **UNSPSC Code**: *81000000 (Engineering and Research and Technology Based Services)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria and Trade Agreements
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision of Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Microbiological Sampling and Testing Services.

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:

Gagne, Jeremy (SPAC/PSPC)
jeremy.gagne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL
Download the document for more information: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17378072?extsite=MTczNzgwNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17378072?extsite=MTczNzgwNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Important Notes
Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on the tender closing date, November 13, 2023, by 2:00 PM EST. Any bid submitted after this time will be declared
